title: Small number of customers impacted by myki overcharge
articleContent:
Small number of customers impacted by myki overcharge

News > Fares/Tickets

On the 1 January public holiday, a small number of concession myki users did not receive the fare cap they were entitled to, leading to overpayments of $1.70 or less.

We have reimbursed all impacted customers impacted by this issue and apologise for any inconvenience caused.
articleDescription: On the 1 January public holiday, a small number of concession myki users did not receive the fare cap they were entitled to, we have reimbursed all impacted customers.
